org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.never
Class GridCacheNeverEvictionPolicy<K,V>

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.never.GridCacheNeverEvictionPolicy<K,V>
All Implemented Interfaces:
GridCacheEvictionPolicy<K,V>, GridCacheNeverEvictionPolicyMBean
public class GridCacheNeverEvictionPolicy<K,V>
extends Object
implements GridCacheEvictionPolicy<K,V>, GridCacheNeverEvictionPolicyMBean

Cache eviction policy that does not do anything. This eviction policy can be used whenever it is known that cache size is constant and won't change or grow infinitely.

By default this policy allows empty (null-valued) entries. However, one can enable this policy to evict empty entries either by creating this policy with constructor GridCacheNeverEvictionPolicy.GridCacheNeverEvictionPolicy(boolean) or by calling GridCacheNeverEvictionPolicy.setAllowEmptyEntries(boolean).
